serial number : has to be unique within one source
name of the application - name of the program

Operation code (I : insert ; D : delete)

To be used by the AG itself when re-issueing an input event : e.g. deadlocks

Phase recycling : only to be used in batch version
Segment type name : only to be used in batch version

Indication of type of fee under the event type "fees"

Currency of the nominal amount to deliver expressed in ISO3
Currency of the cash flow transaction; expressed in ISO3

Nominal amount liability (to deliver)

Sign of the transaction: B = Buy ; S = Sell
Sign of the option transaction: P = Put ; C = Call
